text: Kuttram Purindhaal, also Kuttram Purinthal (English: If the Crime is Committed) is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language suspense thriller film starring Aadhik Babu, Archana, Abhinaya, M.S. Bhaskar, Rams, Nishanth, and Arul D. Shangar in the lead roles. The film is written and directed by Disney, with music composed by K.S. Manoj, cinematography by K. Gokul, and edited by S.P. Ahamed. The film was produced by Amaravathi Films Studios Productions. ==Plot== The film takes place in Chennai, and tells the story of a man driven to seek justice while targeting not only his family's killer but also those who have supported a corrupt criminal justice system, intending to assassinate anyone supporting it. == References == # "Kuttram Purindhal Tamil movie 2018"- Via megatamil.in # "Upcoming film Kuttram Purindhaal"- Via cineinfotv.com # "Abhinaya Dons Cop avatar in Kuttram Purinndhaal"- Via Deccan chronicle Category:Unreleased Tamil-language films Category:Indian thriller films Category:2018 films Category:Indian films Category:2010s thriller films
